comments.content: The name says it all - sounds like contact lens solution.

_“The senior zone’s signs will have a larger font size called Clearview”_

pica ... augustin ... great primer ... clearview
To have your typeface referred to as a size. Grand compliment indeed.

I had the tragic fortune of driving through the state of Texas this past year while the Clearview signs were being phased in. It was fascinating to see Clearview side by side with the remaining Highway Gothic signage - which was pretty common especially in larger freeway areas. I must say, seniors didn’t come to mind though.
I’ve driven in Texas and it didn’t seem too bad - just remember to floor it and don’t use your turn signals - nothing to it really.
